verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֧ר <WH559> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כְּתָב־ <WH3789> Write לְךָ֗ אֵ֧ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1697> thee all the words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> that I have spoken אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to you סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH5612> unto thee in a book

כִּ֠י <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> For lo the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְ֠שַׁבְתִּי <WH7725> that I will bring again אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁב֨וּת <WH7622> the captivity עַמִּ֧י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and Judah אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֗ים <WH7725> and I will cause them to return אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> to the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לַאֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> to their fathers וִֽירֵשֽׁוּהָ׃ <WH3423> and they shall possess פ

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> now these הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <WH1697> And these [are] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> concerning Israel וְאֶל־ <WH413> and concerning יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> and concerning Judah

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹה֙ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD ק֥וֹל <WH6963> a voice חֲרָדָ֖ה <WH2731> of trembling שָׁמָ֑עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard פַּ֖חַד <WH6343> of fear וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> and not of peace

שַׁאֲלוּ־ <WH7592> Ask נָ֣א <WH4994> now וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> ye now and see אִם־ <WH518> If יֹלֵ֖ד <WH3205> doth travail with child זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> whether a man מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> Why רָאִ֨יתִי <WH7200> ? wherefore do I see כָל־ <WH3605> every גֶּ֜בֶר <WH1397> every man יָדָ֤יו <WH3027> with his hands עַל־ <WH5921> on חֲלָצָיו֙ <WH2504> on his loins כַּיּ֣וֹלֵדָ֔ה <WH3205> as a woman in travail וְנֶהֶפְכ֥וּ <WH2015> are turned כָל־ <WH3605> every פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> and all faces לְיֵרָקֽוֹן׃ <WH3420> greenish

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Alas כִּ֥י <WH3588> for גָד֛וֹל <WH1419> [is] great הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> for that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he מֵאַ֣יִן <WH369> so that כָּמֹ֑הוּ <WH3644> like וְעֵֽת־ <WH6256> none [is] like it it [is] even the time צָרָ֥ה <WH6869> trouble הִיא֙ <WH1931> he לְיַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob's וּמִמֶּ֖נָּה <WH4480> at יִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> but he shall be saved

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> shall come בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> For it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֶשְׁבֹּ֤ר <WH7665> [that] I will break עֻלּוֹ֙ <WH5923> his yoke מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> off צַוָּארֶ֔ךָ <WH6677> from off thy neck וּמוֹסְרוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH4147> thy bonds אֲנַתֵּ֑ק <WH5423> and will burst וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will no יַעַבְדוּ־ <WH5647> shall no more serve ב֥וֹ ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer זָרִֽים׃ <WH2114> and strangers

וְעָ֣בְד֔וּ <WH5647> But they shall serve אֵ֖ת <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וְאֵת֙ <WH853> דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> and David מַלְכָּ֔ם <WH4428> their king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אָקִ֖ים <WH6965> whom I will raise up לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like ס

וְאַתָּ֡ה <WH859> you אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּירָא֩ <WH3372> Therefore fear עַבְדִּ֨י <WH5650> thou not O my servant יַעֲקֹ֤ב <WH3290> Jacob נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהֹוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחַ֣ת <WH2865> neither be dismayed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel כִּ֠י <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold מוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֙ <WH3467> for lo I will save מֵֽרָח֔וֹק <WH7350> thee from afar וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> and thy seed מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the land שִׁבְיָ֑ם <WH7628> of their captivity וְשָׁ֧ב <WH7725> shall return יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> and Jacob וְשָׁקַ֥ט <WH8252> and shall be in rest וְשַׁאֲנַ֖ן <WH7599> and be quiet וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none shall make [him] afraid

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִתְּךָ֥ <WH854> for אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> For I [am] with thee saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְהֽוֹשִׁיעֶ֑ךָ <WH3467> to save כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֶעֱשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> thee though I make כָלָ֜ה <WH3617> a full end בְּכָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֣ם ׀ <WH1471> of all nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> I הֲפִצוֹתִ֣יךָ <WH6327> whither I have scattered שָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> in it אַ֤ךְ <WH389> Only אֹֽתְךָ֙ <WH854> and will by לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> thee yet will I not make כָלָ֔ה <WH3617> a full end וְיִסַּרְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH3256> of thee but I will correct לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> thee in measure וְנַקֵּ֖ה <WH5352> and will not leave thee altogether לֹ֥א <WH3808> no אֲנַקֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH5352> unpunished פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אָנ֣וּשׁ <WH605> [is] incurable לְשִׁבְרֵ֑ךְ <WH7667> Thy bruise נַחְלָ֖ה <WH2470> [is] grievous מַכָּתֵֽךְ׃ <WH4347> [and] thy wound

אֵֽין־ <WH369> There דָּ֥ן <WH1777> [There is] none to plead דִּינֵ֖ךְ <WH1779> thy cause לְמָז֑וֹר <WH4205> that thou mayest be bound up רְפֻא֥וֹת <WH7499> medicines תְּעָלָ֖ה <WH8585> thou hast no healing אֵ֥ין <WH369> is no לָֽךְ׃

כָּל־ <WH3605> All מְאַהֲבַ֣יִךְ <WH157> All thy lovers שְׁכֵח֔וּךְ <WH7911> have forgotten אוֹתָ֖ךְ <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִדְרֹ֑שׁוּ <WH1875> thee they seek כִּי֩ <WH3588> with מַכַּ֨ת <WH4347> thee with the wound אוֹיֵ֤ב <WH341> of an enemy הִכִּיתִיךְ֙ <WH5221> thee not for I have wounded מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> with the chastisement אַכְזָרִ֔י <WH394> of a cruel one עַ֚ל <WH5921> Because רֹ֣ב <WH7230> for the multitude עֲוֹנֵ֔ךְ <WH5771> of thine iniquity עָצְמ֖וּ <WH6105> were increased חַטֹּאתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH2403> [because] thy sins

מַה־ <WH4100> Why תִּזְעַק֙ <WH2199> Why criest עַל־ <WH5921> over שִׁבְרֵ֔ךְ <WH7667> affliction אָנ֖וּשׁ <WH605> [is] incurable מַכְאֹבֵ֑ךְ <WH4341> grief עַ֣ל ׀ <WH5921> Because רֹ֣ב <WH7230> for the multitude עֲוֹנֵ֗ךְ <WH5771> of thine iniquity עָֽצְמוּ֙ <WH6105> were increased חַטֹּאתַ֔יִךְ <WH2403> [because] thy sins עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> I have done אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לָֽךְ׃

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹכְלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH398> Therefore all they that devour יֵאָכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> thee shall be devoured וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all צָרַ֥יִךְ <WH6862> and all thine adversaries כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> every בַּשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> into captivity יֵלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> will go וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> become שֹׁאסַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7601> spoil לִמְשִׁסָּ֔ה <WH4933> thee shall be a spoil וְכָל־ <WH3605> one בֹּזְזַ֖יִךְ <WH962> and all that prey אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> upon thee will I give לָבַֽז׃ <WH957> for a prey

כִּי֩ <WH3588> Because אַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> For I will restore אֲרֻכָ֥ה <WH724> health לָ֛ךְ וּמִמַּכּוֹתַ֥יִךְ <WH4347> thee of thy wounds אֶרְפָּאֵ֖ךְ <WH7495> unto thee and I will heal נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because נִדָּחָה֙ <WH5080> thee an Outcast קָ֣רְאוּ <WH7121> because they called לָ֔ךְ צִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> [saying] This [is] Zion הִ֔יא <WH1931> he דֹּרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> whom no man seeketh after אֵ֥ין <WH369> no לָֽהּ׃ ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִי־ <WH2005> behold שָׁב֙ <WH7725> Behold I will bring again שְׁבוּת֙ <WH7622> the captivity אָהֳלֵ֣י <WH168> tents יַֽעֲק֔וֹב <WH3290> of Jacob's וּמִשְׁכְּנֹתָ֖יו <WH4908> on his dwellingplaces אֲרַחֵ֑ם <WH7355> and have mercy וְנִבְנְתָ֥ה <WH1129> shall be builded עִיר֙ <WH5892> and the city עַל־ <WH5921> on תִּלָּ֔הּ <WH8510> upon her own heap וְאַרְמ֖וֹן <WH759> and the palace עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁפָּט֥וֹ <WH4941> after the manner יֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> shall remain

וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> And out of them shall proceed מֵהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like תּוֹדָ֖ה <WH8426> thanksgiving וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice מְשַׂחֲקִ֑ים <WH7832> of them that make merry וְהִרְבִּתִים֙ <WH7235> and I will multiply וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and they יִמְעָ֔טוּ <WH4591> them and they shall not be few וְהִכְבַּדְתִּ֖ים <WH3513> I will also glorify וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and they יִצְעָֽרוּ׃ <WH6819> them and they shall not be small

וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> become בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> Their children כְּקֶ֔דֶם <WH6924> also shall be as aforetime וַעֲדָת֖וֹ <WH5712> and their congregation לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> before תִּכּ֑וֹן <WH3559> shall be established וּפָ֣קַדְתִּ֔י <WH6485> me and I will punish עַ֖ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all לֹחֲצָֽיו׃ <WH3905> all that oppress

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become אַדִּיר֜וֹ <WH117> And their nobles מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> of them וּמֹֽשְׁלוֹ֙ <WH4910> shall be of themselves and their governor מִקִּרְבּ֣וֹ <WH7130> from the midst יֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> shall proceed וְהִקְרַבְתִּ֖יו <WH7126> of them and I will cause him to draw near וְנִגַּ֣שׁ <WH5066> and he shall approach אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about כִּי֩ <WH3588> For מִ֨י <WH4310> who הוּא־ <WH1931> he זֶ֜ה <WH2088> he עָרַ֧ב <WH6148> unto me for who [is] this that engaged אֶת־ <WH853> לִבּ֛וֹ <WH3820> his heart לָגֶ֥שֶׁת <WH5066> to approach אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me? saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
וִהְיִ֥יתֶם <WH1961> become לִ֖י לְעָ֑ם <WH5971> And ye shall be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <WH595> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> and I will be your God ס

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold סַעֲרַ֣ת <WH5591> Behold the whirlwind יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD חֵמָה֙ <WH2534> with fury יָֽצְאָ֔ה <WH3318> goeth forth סַ֖עַר <WH5591> whirlwind מִתְגּוֹרֵ֑ר <WH1641> a continuing עַ֛ל <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head רְשָׁעִ֖ים <WH7563> of the wicked יָחֽוּל׃ <WH2342> it shall fall with pain

לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יָשׁ֗וּב <WH7725> shall not return חֲרוֹן֙ <WH2740> The fierce אַף־ <WH639> anger יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> Until עֲשֹׂת֥וֹ <WH6213> until he have done וְעַד־ <WH5704> and until הֲקִימ֖וֹ <WH6965> [it] and until he have performed מְזִמּ֣וֹת <WH4209> the intents לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> of his heart בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> in the latter הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> days תִּתְבּ֥וֹנְנוּ <WH995> ye shall consider בָֽהּ׃
